text: A demand paging system takes 100 time units to service a page fault and 300 time units to replace a dirty page. Memory access time is 1 time unit. The probability of a page fault is p. In case of a page fault, the probability of page being dirty is also p. It is observed that the average access time is 3 time units. Then the value of pis A 0.194 B.0.233 C.0.514 D.0.981 gateit-2007 operating-system page-replacement probability normal
